courses
Class Catalogue

java.lang.Object
  courses.Catalogue

public class Catalogue
extends java.lang.Object

Contains information for all Schedules in general. Instances are immutable.

Invariants:

  • The master course list
  • The day/night cutoff time
  • The available time slots

Version:
May 30, 2011: Jon made small modifications, added class doc, added getGeneralTime, May 27, 2011: Class created.
Author:
Gregory Cloutier, Jonathan Caddey

Field Detail

my_course_map

private final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Course> my_course_map
Master Course list from the catalogue.

my_day_slots

private final java.util.Collection<DaySlot> my_day_slots
All possible combinations of days during which sections may be offered.

my_day_night_cutoff

private final Time my_day_night_cutoff
The day/night cutoff. Used to determine if classes are during the day or evening.

Constructor Detail

Catalogue

public Catalogue(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Course> the_course_map,
                 java.util.Collection<DaySlot> the_day_slots,
                 Time a_day_night_cutoff)
Creates a Catalogue object.

Parameters:
the_course_map - A mapping of course IDs to Courses for all Courses offered.
the_day_slots - The available combinations of days Sections may be offered.
a_day_night_cutoff - The day/night cutoff time, where day classes end and evening classes begin.
Method Detail

getCourse

public Course getCourse(java.lang.String the_ID)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Finds a Course given a course ID, or returns null if it is not found. Preconditions:
  • the_course != null
Postconditions:
  • none

Parameters:
the_ID - the ID of the Course sought.
Returns:
the Course with the given ID, or null if no course is found. when otherwise.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the_ID is null.

getDaySlots

public java.util.Collection<DaySlot> getDaySlots()
Preconditions:
  • none.
Postconditions:
  • does not return null

Returns:
every possible combination of Days a Section is allowed to be held on.

getGeneralTime

public GeneralTime getGeneralTime(Time the_time)
                           throws java.lang.NullPointerException
Determines which general time of day the given time is in.

Preconditions:
  • the_time != null
Postconditions:
  • none

Parameters:
the_time - the time in question.
Returns:
what general time of day the given time belongs to.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if the_time is null.
